name: typescript-logging
description: Library for logging, written in typescript, can be used by normal es5+ javascript as well.

scripts.build: tsc && npm run tslint && webpack --config webpack.config.bundle.js && webpack --config webpack.config.bundle-min.js
scripts.docs: typedoc --tsconfig tsconfig-docs.json --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --mode modules --out dist/bundle/docs/api src/logging/typescript-logging.ts && github-markdown docs/latest.md --flavor gfm --title 'TypeScript logging documentation' > dist/bundle/docs/index.html && node scripts/process-docs.js dist/bundle
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run test && npm run docs

author: Martijn Reuvers <martijnr.work@gmail.com> (http://www.javalid.org)
